title: Metal shields with crystallographic discrepancies incorporated into integrated architectures for stable lithium metal batteries
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D3EE02372A, Paper
Ki-Yeop Cho, Sungjun Cho, Gun Young Jung, KwangSup Eom
The lithiophobic properties of metals are investigated to discover metal shields preventing top-surface Li accumulation on versatile 3D-hosts. A facile top-down method is devised for the first time to integrate the metal shields into 3D-hosts.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
